original_title: โคลนนิ่ง คนก๊อปปี้คน
overview: Niwat is an ordinary person who has to deal with extraordinary events. When someone who looks just like him hurts and tries to kill in order to take his place and take over everything, his friends, family and the person he loves the most is May Sommai, the culprit policeman, so he fights to regain the life he used to be. Along with investigating the secret of the mysterious man b-7 and how did it come about?
title: Cloning
